author: stefan2
msg: Rename potentially misleading FS index related error codes.
Because the term "item index" has a specific meaning in logical addressing,
we should not reuse it for general FS index-related errors.
SVN_ERR_FS_ITEM_INDEX_INCONSISTENT): Rename these error codes to ...
(): Global search of the old error codes and replace them with the new ones.

author: markt
msg: Ensure that ConcurrentMessageDigest has been configured to use the requested algorithm.
Note that this still results in a call to MessageDigest.getInstance() which will trigger the NoSuchAlgorithmException if necessary

author: markt
msg: Ensure that an attempt to call digest.[sh|bat] with no args triggers the usage message

msg: LUCENE-5911: Add MemoryIndex.freeze() to allow for thread-safe searching
